description: This table contains information about authorization records. This includes links to the patient, referral, and coverage/payer.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The authorization ID for the authorization record.

columns.name: AUTH_FROM_DT
columns.description: Authorization start date

columns.name: AUTH_TO_DT
columns.description: Authorization end date

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The patient for whom the authorization record was created.  This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: Referral associated with this authorization. If this is a UM owned service-level authorization, this column is not populated and, instead, column UM_REFERRAL_ID will be populated. This column is frequently used to link to the REFERRAL table.

columns.name: AUTH_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Authorization type category value


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Procedure

columns.name: NUM_SVCS_APPROVED
columns.description: Number of services, units or visits approved.

columns.name: NUM_SVCS_REQUESTED
columns.description: Number of services, units, or visits requested.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: Linked coverage record. This column is frequently used to link to the COVERAGE table.

columns.name: AUTH_NUM
columns.description: Authorization number

columns.name: AUTH_COMMENTS
columns.description: Free text authorization comment.

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: Record creation date.

columns.name: CHARGE_COUNTS
columns.description: Keeps track of number of counts used by charges.

columns.name: AUTH_REF_NUMBER
columns.description: The reference number given to us by the payer for this service-level authorization (AUT).

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_COUNT
columns.description: Number of services, units, or visits used for AP Claims.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_SVCS_APRV
columns.description: The number of services approved for each interval.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_SVCS_REQ
columns.description: The number of services requested for each interval.

columns.name: INTER_APRV_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated Frequency Record for the approved recurring authorization.

columns.name: INTER_APRV_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: INTER_REQ_FREQ_ID
columns.description: The ID of the associated Frequency Record for the requested recurring authorization.

columns.name: INTER_REQ_FREQ_ID_FREQ_NAME
columns.description: The name of the frequency record.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_APRV
columns.description: The number of times the interval has been approved to repeat.

columns.name: INTER_NUM_REQ
columns.description: The number of times the interval has been requested to repeat.

columns.name: PARENT_AUTH_ID
columns.description: The Parent Authorization that this authorization (AUT) inherits from.

columns.name: AP_CLAIM_COUNT_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
The counting method for the AP Claim counts.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Counts not tracked


Once per day


By service quantity

columns.name: UM_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The utilization management authorization decision status for the requested service.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Authorized


Partially Authorized


Pending Review


Withdrawn


Denied


Dismissed


No Authorization Required


Closed


Pending External Review

columns.name: UM_APPROVED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the authorized status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_PART_APRV_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the partial authorization status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_DENIED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the denied status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_DISMISSED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the dismissed status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_NOT_REQUIRED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the no auth required status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_PENDING_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the pending status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_CANCELED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the canceled/withdrawn status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_DECISION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the authorization decision was set on the service level authorization.

columns.name: NON_UM_AUTH_ID
columns.description: Service authorizations that are created as part of UM workflows will only appear in UM workflows. If the authorization details are needed outside the UM department, then corresponding non-UM service-level authorizations are created. This separation is required to ensure non-UM staff cannot alter authorization decisions rendered by UM staff. This column provides a link between the UM service authorizations and non-UM service-level authorizations. There is a 1-to-1 link between UM and non-UM service-level authorizations.

columns.name: UM_AUTH_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: If this is a UM-owned service authorization, this column serves as the pointer to the authorization request record. UM-owned service authorizations do not have direct pointers to referral and coverage. They must be accessed through the authorization request.

columns.name: NON_UM_ORDER_ID
columns.description: This is a link between a UM service authorization and an order on the referral.

columns.name: ORDER_ENTRY_ORDER_ID
columns.description: When the service is created as part of order entry, this column will be populated as a pointer back to the order.

columns.name: UM_CLOSED_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the closed status was assigned to this service.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: UM_FINALIZE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the user record that finalized this authorization. This column is frequently used to link to the CLARITY_EMP table.

columns.name: FINAL_UM_STATUS_CHANGE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The change source category ID that resulted in the finalized status of the service.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual Update


Auto Status Assignment


Imported

columns.name: UM_MED_DIR_REV_USER_ID
columns.description: The user who set the pending review status reason for a medical director review.

columns.name: UM_PEND_MED_DIRECTOR_DTTM
columns.description: The local date and time of when the authorization pended for review with a reason of medical director review.

columns.name: UM_PEND_MED_DIRECTOR_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time in UTC of when the authorization pended for review with a reason of medical director review.

columns.name: APPEALED_SERVICE_AUTH_ID
columns.description: The ID of the service that this service was created to appeal.
